price: Ohun tí A ṣe ní ìgbádùn fún wọn kò sì níí rọ̀ wọ́n lọ́rọ̀.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yumattaʿūna
